Name: Tiny Hill
About the game: Tiny hill - Are you ready to learn the story of a small hill? In this quirky hardcore platformer, you take on the role of a microscopic inhabitant of a small hill who is trying to collect as many coins as possible to fulfill his dream. and again.. Can you get to the end? Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack
